item.title: Favorite garments
item.description: Base layer All good option, get the one on sale. Karrimor quarter zip €15,00 Cheapest one, still waiting to check quality. Craft CORE gain €35,00 Nike pacer 1/2 zip €40,00 Mid layer Should be black. Arc'teryx Proton LT €300,00 Best combination of style, quality, warmth and breathability. Patagonia Nano air €250,00 Second option.
